text.p: Eastern Environmental Services Inc said Thursday that it has completed a public offering of 4.5 million shares of common stock at a price of $17.75 per share.
All of the shares are being sold by Eastern. The company also has granted the underwriters an option to purchase an additional 675,000 shares to cover over-allotments.
Proceeds of the offering are to be used to repay all of the outstanding indebtedness under Eastern's credit facility, to fund acquisitions and capital expenditures and provide working capital.
Eastern Environmental is a non-hazardous solid waste management company specializing in the collection, transportation and disposal of residential, industrial, commercial and special waste.
